issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
programatically selected tableViewRow becomes deselected on event mouseout. In iPhone_SDK tableViewRow becomes deselected only after click outside this row.
how to: Kitchensink_HTML5>Table View>Select rows> select a row by button 'Select row'> move mouse against the selected row and then outside the row.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: tableViewRow becomes deselected on event mouseout.
